mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.goods_id AS "goodsId", a.goods_category_id AS "goodsCategoryId", a.goods_name AS "goodsName", a.goods_barcode AS "goodsBarcode", a.goods_title AS "goodsTitle", a.goods_type AS "goodsType", a.unit AS "unit", a.image AS "image", a.goods_desp AS "goodsDesp", a.order_no AS "orderNo", a.goods_price AS "goodsPrice", a.discount_rate AS "discountRate", a.discount_amount AS "discountAmount", a.count AS "count", a.subtotal AS "subtotal"
LEFT JOIN order_info b ON b.id = a.order_no
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_goods( id, goods_id, goods_category_id, goods_name, goods_barcode, goods_title, goods_type, unit, image, goods_desp, order_no, goods_price, discount_rate, discount_amount, count, subtotal ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{goodsId}, #{goodsCategoryId}, #{goodsName}, #{goodsBarcode}, #{goodsTitle}, #{goodsType}, #{unit}, #{image}, #{goodsDesp}, #{orderNo}, #{goodsPrice}, #{discountRate}, #{discountAmount}, #{count}, #{subtotal} )
mapper.update: UPDATE order_goods SET goods_id = #{goodsId}, goods_category_id = #{goodsCategoryId}, goods_name = #{goodsName}, goods_barcode = #{goodsBarcode}, goods_title = #{goodsTitle}, goods_type = #{goodsType}, unit = #{unit}, image = #{image}, goods_desp = #{goodsDesp}, order_no = #{orderNo}, goods_price = #{goodsPrice}, discount_rate = #{discountRate}, discount_amount = #{discountAmount}, count = #{count}, subtotal = #{subtotal} WHERE id = #{id}
